content: Define the module TopModule with inputs a, b and outputs out_and, out_or, out_xor, out_nand, out_nor, out_xnor, out_anotb.
source: I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified. - input  a - input  b - output out_and - output out_or - output out_xor - output out_nand - output out_nor - output out_xnor - output out_anotb

content: Implement the logic for out_and as the AND operation between inputs a and b.
Implement the logic for out_or as the OR operation between inputs a and b.
Implement the logic for out_xor as the XOR operation between inputs a and b.
Implement the logic for out_nand as the NAND operation between inputs a and b.
Implement the logic for out_nor as the NOR operation between inputs a and b.
Implement the logic for out_xnor as the XNOR operation between inputs a and b.
Implement the logic for out_anotb as the AND-NOT operation between input a and the negation of input b.
